item.title: Slicehost Articles
item.dc:creator: Jason Meridth
item.description:
If you are Linux newbie or are still unsure about how to setup your Linux box/slice/server, take a serious look at the Slicehost Articles.  Other articles include setup of Apache, Nginx, Postfix, MySQL, Ruby on Rails, Capistrano, SSH, Self-signed certificates, Django, etc.

For all the Only Windows guys who read this, these articles are a great way to get your feet wet with Linux.  Can't hurt your pocket book.  It's free. Ubuntu is currently my favorite distribution.

I've tweeted about this a number of times.

These articles are phenomenal.
